sentence.text: Although no clinical drug-drug interaction studies have been conducted to date, on the basis of the in vitro studies, cytochrome p450 inhibitors and inducers are unlikely to affect the metabolism of clofarabine.
sentence.negationtags: Although <xcope><cue>no</cue> clinical drug-drug interaction studies have been conducted to date</xcope>, on the basis of the in vitro studies, cytochrome p450 inhibitors and inducers are unlikely to affect the metabolism of clofarabine.

sentence.text: The effect of clofarabine on the metabolism of cytochrome p450 substrates has not been studied.
sentence.negationtags: The effect of clofarabine on <xcope>the metabolism of cytochrome p450 substrates has <cue>not</cue> been studied</xcope>.

sentence.text: Drug/Laboratory Tests Interactions There are no known clinically significant interactions of CLOLAR? with other medications or laboratory tests.
sentence.negationtags: Drug/Laboratory Tests Interactions There are <xcope><cue>no</cue> known clinically significant interactions of CLOLAR? with other medications or laboratory tests</xcope>.

sentence.text: No formal drug/laboratory test interaction studies have been conducted with CLOLAR? .
sentence.negationtags: <xcope><cue>No</cue> formal drug/laboratory test interaction studies have been conducted with CLOLAR? </xcope>.
